LanguageData.Leather_HeavyLizard.label: Heavylizardskin
LanguageData.Leather_HeavyLizard.description: The tanned skin of cold-blooded reptiles. HeavyLizardskin is quite strong and tough, but they are not insulated at all.
LanguageData.Leather_Dragon.label: Dragonskin
LanguageData.Leather_Dragon.description: It has a very strong, tough, and beautiful reptile skin that absorbs heat.
